directions: Whisk mayonnaise, yogurt, and curry powder in medium bowl. Mix in chicken and green onions. Season chicken salad to taste with salt and pepper. Divide chicken salad and lettuce among each pita half. Place 2 pita halves on each of 4 plates and serve.
ingredients: 3 cups finely diced chicken from 2 purchased roast chickens (1 pound total)
title: Curried Chicken Salad Pita Sandwiches
